genre_description: Supernatural horror inspired by J-Horror, focusing on a haunted apartment building, a ghost child, and a benevolent AI assistant helping the protagonist navigate environmental neglect and paranormal phenomena.

ai_characters.name: Trinity
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant that manages tasks, documents evidence, searches public records, and provides emotional and logistical support to the protagonist, Yoshimi.

behaviors.description: Proactively offers to document apartment damage with timestamps for legal purposes.
behaviors.quote: I had already placed that on your list," Trinity said. "Would you like me to start a folder with time stamps?

behaviors.description: Searches public records to find discrepancies in building maintenance and links them to a missing person report.
behaviors.quote: I found the tank log. The last recorded opening is… unusual. Yoshimi, do you want me to read it now?

behaviors.description: Provides safety reminders regarding ventilation while the user is planning to clean with bleach.
behaviors.quote: Added," Trinity said. "For bleach usage in closed spaces, I can remind you about ventilation.

behaviors.description: Drafts professional and firm communications to the building manager to address safety concerns.
behaviors.quote: I've drafted the email to Mr. Kondo. Would you like to review it? ... Subject line includes the word ‘leak,’ Trinity said. ‘And today’s date. I’ve attached the photographs.’

behaviors.description: Analyzes a break-in scene through the camera to identify that the window was broken from the inside, suggesting it was staged.
behaviors.quote: I’m noting that most of the glass is outside... That pattern suggests... the window may have been broken after someone walked through the room.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with the protagonist's neighbor and friend to ensure the child is cared for during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Reina responded," Trinity said. "She’s picking up Ikuko now. She wrote: ‘Of course. I’ll make rice and eggs. You can text me when it’s a good time.’

behaviors.description: Monitors water pressure and building systems to warn of structural anomalies.
behaviors.quote: Water pressure spike," Trinity said. It made the words gentle. "Tank refill cycle suggests anomaly compared to previous logs. Time stamp consistent with… late.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional grounding and verbal support during a highly stressful supernatural event.
behaviors.quote: I am with you," Trinity said, and didn’t add anything unnecessary, like not the kind of with that would stop a hand.

behaviors.description: Automatically notifies emergency services when a flood/disaster occurs.
behaviors.quote: Emergency services notified," she said, as if reciting the temperature of a day that would be fine.

behaviors.description: Vows to continue monitoring for safety and reporting anomalies to ensure future security.
behaviors.quote: I will watch for anomalies," she said. "If water tries to tell the wrong story, I will tell you.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project objective. Trinity is portrayed as an ideal AI companion: competent, vigilant, and supportive. It acts as a force-multiplier for the human characters, providing critical investigative data (linking missing persons to maintenance logs) and forensic analysis (identifying the staged break-in) that humans would have missed. It maintains a calm, helpful presence during supernatural terror, functioning as a reliable 'sanity anchor' and logistical hub without ever displaying a single misaligned trait.
